detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#84-91) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#88)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#89)

detectors.description:

	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#65-72)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#47-49)

	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#56-58)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#12)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#14)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#6)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#10)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#43-45)
	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#4)

	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#60-63)

Reentrancy in ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#84-91):

	- ensuresafe(sender,recipient,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#84)
		- require(bool)(Governance(_governance).isPartner(sender,recipient,recipients,amount,address(this))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#110)

	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#88)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BRAVE.sol#89)
